title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Skills: Hybrid Language Learning: Practitioner Competencies Based on Remote Education Models

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: The learner participates in 90% or more of the 45-minute weekly video conference sessions (3 times per week) to enhance real-time interaction skills.
The learner completes 15-minute microlearning content 5 times per week via a mobile platform to strengthen language fundamentals.
The learner engages in 3 or more team projects using collaborative tools (shared documents, digital whiteboards) in a hybrid environment.
The learner achieves an 80% or higher mastery rate through formative assessments (quizzes, feedback sessions) at the end of each module.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
